_comment: Runs when Upgrade tries to downgrade (right-click in eighth slot).
`execute if score @s bentenc.score1 matches 'id' run function namespace:upgrade/downgrade_custom_entity`
Remember to load the entity nbt saved using the `function bentenc:aliens/upgrade/load_entity_data` function if you did so.
Also remember to set player's `bentenc.score1` to 0.
